A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I went to see The Last Jedi last night and I loved it.

I know some fans will be critical because it goes to great lengths to repeatedly and deliberately subvert expectations\, but that's exactly what I liked most. Sure it was sometimes uneven\, but for the first time in ages I saw a Star Wars movie where I had no idea what was going to happen next. As a result it was exciting in a way the series hasn't been since Empire.

GO\, now\, before you are spoiled.
